name: d3-hilbert
description: D3 layout to visualize distance variables using a continuous Hilbert space-filling space.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-hilbert.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-hilbert.js -c -m -o build/d3-hilbert.min.js
